name: The Unofficial ONaSR R Trilogy
description:
Welcome to the game page of The ONaSR R Trilogy! Please don't forget that this Trilogy is an UNOFFICIAL remakes, so do not report it blindl

How does it feel that you are trapped in your own house with some nightmares that try to kill you? You never want to experience this, right? Well, you are doing it right now, and if you want to get rid of them, try to stay against them and survive until 6 AM, or you can just sit down and wait until they rip off your body...

Prof. Malek ~ Owner, 3D Modeler, Coder

LaRDeNGames ~ Backup Coder, Beta Tester

Raytheree ~ Co-Owner, Beta Tester

E.K.P ~ Game Page Manager

Brudda Creator ~ 3D Modeler

JoelSpringtrap ~ Backup Coder, Beta Tester

lettuce boi ~ 3D Modeler (Springtrap)

Spinofan ~ 3D Modeler (Dark Freddy and Plushtrap)

AlexSFM ~ 3D Editor (Mini Lockbear)

Superluigilover9999 ~ Creator of the original ONaSTR

Freakshow_Canines ~ voice actor

Some of the 3D properties come from random stock 3D models websites.

Engine/Language Clickteam Series

Published On
October 27, 2019

『3 years after the old Fredbear's Family Diner closed down... 』

『"We have reopened Fredbear's Family Diner! You can come to our restaurant, have delicious fast foods and get entertained by our animatronics!"

You have to watch the place during the midnight, to make sure nothing goes wrong, though it would...』

Professor Malek ♢ Owner, Renders Maker, Main coder

Spinofan ♢ 3D Modeler (toy fredbear/springbonnie)

lettuce boi ♢ 3D Modeler (springtrap)

Freakshow_Canines ♢ voice actor

MoonGolem ♢ 3d Modeler(locker)

AndyPurro, DaMikel, TangoTeds ♢ 3d modelers (the map)

Superluigilover9999 ♢ Creator of the original ONaSTR

Engine/Language Clickteam Series

Published On
January 16, 2020

『 Welcome to the game page of One Night at Springtrap 3 REMAKE! Please don't forget that this game is an UNOFFICIAL remake, so do not report it blindly 』

HOW TO PLAY:

  • You have a flashlight,use it to see who's on the window on your office or to see who's on the hallway
  • There is a music box on cam 4,make sure to wind it up
  • If Nightmare springtrap is on the window then go to hallway(by looking at left side and click that thing it made you leaves the office or return to the office) and wait on the hallway
  • If you see Nightmare Spring-puppet on the hallway,go back to the office,if nightmare springtrap was still on the window then go back to the office and then quickly get out
  • Sometimes if you return to the office,LockBunny will appear,if he appear,get out of the office
  • Also there is a common chance to Lockbear appear when you close the camera,if he appear then do NOT get out of the office,just reopen the camera again,he can be annoying since his chance to appear is common
  • ⛧『Prof. Malek』⛧ - Owner, coder, 3d editor
  • Kroshx2 - cutscene animator
  • TheCrowdedOne - 3d modeler (lockbear)
  • Rjac25 - 3d modeler (nightmare springtrap)
  • Spinofan - 3d modeler (lockbunny, nightmare puppet)
  • AndyPurro, DaMikel, TangoTeds - 3d modelers (the map)
  • Superluigilover9999 - Creator of the original ONaSTR
  • JCCO2468 - 8-Bit Sprites Maker
  • Raytheree - Bug fixer

RaytheREE!

spook_

Damlik

  • Atleast 2GB Ram
  • Windows 7-10
  • AMD Processor or equivalent
  • Basically, just have a good Windows computer/laptop

Engine/Language Clickteam Series
